All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.component.Component, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.TryCatchTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.TryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, Restful, RestProblemReportingTrait, RestRequest
public class JettyRestRequest extends com.telenav.kivakit.component.BaseComponent implements com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.trait.TryTrait, RestRequest, RestProblemReportingTrait
Not public API

Represents an HTTP REST request to a microservlet in Jetty.

The readRequest(Class) method parses the JSON payload of a POST request into an object of the given type. It then calls the Validator of the object. Parameters to the request (both path and query parameters) can be retrieved with parameters(). The requested path is available through path(), and the version of the REST application is provided by version().

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
